title: Summer Bonus: The Hungry Rock/A Girl With Superpowers/The Chessmaster
description:
Sure, it’s September. Sure, school has started. But summer hasn’t technically ended! At least it hasn’t for the Story Pirates, who have a new summer bonus episode just for you. 
Today’s episode features a brand new story from Savi in Oregon called The Hungry Rock, as well as two greatest hits from last season, A Girl With Superpowers and The Chess Master.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
